text: Ubusabe bwabo muri ryo buzaba ari (ukuvuga bati) "Sub’hanaka Allahuma (ubutagatifu ni ubwawe,Nyagasani!)" kandi indamukanyo yabo muri ryo izaba ari "Salamu"(kwifurizanya amahoro). Naho umusozo w’ubusabe bwabo ni (ukuvuga bati) "Al’ham’du lilahi rabil alamina" (Ishimwe n’ikuzo byuzuye bikwiye Allah, Nyagasani w’ibiremwa byose)
